Core

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    ML.Player - GUI Class

    - Controller of Graphical User Interface

    Version:
    0.2c

    Class-wise Change Log: 0.1c -> 0.2c

    - Formal Documentation Added for class.

    - Constructors created for better testing on different resolutions.

    - finalize() method tweaked.

    Author:
    msahil432

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        public GUI()
        Unparameterized Constructor of GUI

        Calls GUI(int, int) and sends current screen's dimensions as parameters.

      • GUI

        public GUI(int width,
           int height)
        Parameterized Constructor of GUI

        Recommended for testing App for different resolutions on a single system.

        Parameters:
        width - width of screen on which program is to be displayed
        height - height of screen on which program is to be displayed

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        First checks if configuration done, if no then executes Planting Controller and goes ahead

        if yes, skips planting

        Then starts to act as Cover controller and executes the correct frame on basis of size

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when resize needed

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
        makes sure that all the created objects are garbage collected

        if this class's object is garbage collected.

        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
